thread.title: Record year for cruise visitors
thread.title_full: Record year for cruise visitors | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Record year for cruise visitors
text:
Guernsey saw a record number of cruise passengers come ashore this year.
Nearly 123,000 people have come onto the island since March.
That's an increase of around almost 20,000 since last year and 10,000 more than the previous record set in 2013.
It comes despite poor weather between June and August which saw 11 visits cancelled.
Last updated Thu 8 Oct 2015 Travel Guernsey
